name: Razer Blade 18 (2025)
description: Ultimate gaming laptop with 18-inch 240Hz QHD+ display, RTX 5080, and Intel Core Ultra 9. Desktop-class performance in a portable package.

reviews.review_text: Desktop replacement done right. 5080 mobile is insane.
18 inches of gaming glory. 240Hz is butter smooth.
Heavy and expensive but performance is unmatched.
